original_text: Then they burned the whole city and everything in it, but they put the silver and gold and the articles of bronze and iron into the treasury of the Lord’s house.
korean_text: 무리가 그 성과 그 가운데에 있는 모든 것을 불로 사르고 은금과 동철 기구는 여호와의 집 곳간에 두었더라

sentences.original_text: Then they burned the whole city

sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 있는 모든 것을 불태웠으나

sentences.original_text: but they put the silver and gold
and the articles of bronze and iron
into the treasury of the Lord's house
